channel.title: Star Wars Miniverse
channel.description: Welcome to Star Wars Miniverse, a podcast dedicated to the Star Wars Miniatures game, a Wizards of the Coast game. Join Mark and Tim as they discuss current rules, errata, give reviews of the various minis, interview guests close to the game, and cover other game-related topics.
channel.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Star Wars Miniverse, a podcast dedicated to the Star Wars Miniatures game, a Wizards of the Coast game. Join Mark and Tim as they discuss current rules, errata, give reviews of the various minis, interview guests close to the game, and cover o
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Star Wars Miniverse, a podcast dedicated to the Star Wars Miniatures game, a Wizards of the Coast game. Join Mark and Tim as they discuss current rules, errata, give reviews of the various minis, interview guests close to the game, and cover other game-related topics.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 53
item.description: In Episode 53, we talk more Regional action and changes that are becoming evident in the style of play this year. We also bring you more figure reviews from Vengeance. And, of course, we bring you another Top Ten List as we await the newest Star Wars Game: X-Wing.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 53, we talk more Regional action and changes that are becoming evident in the style of play this year. We also bring you more figure reviews from Vengeance. And, of course, we bring you another Top Ten List as we await the newest Star Wars Ga
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 53, we talk more Regional action and changes that are becoming evident in the style of play this year. We also bring you more figure reviews from Vengeance. And, of course, we bring you another Top Ten List as we await the newest Star Wars Game: X-Wing.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 52
item.description: In Episode 52, we review more figures from the Vengence V Set. We also talk about an Epic Special Ability and look at more Regional Results.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 52, we review more figures from the Vengence V Set. We also talk about an Epic Special Ability and look at more Regional Results.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 52, we review more figures from the Vengence V Set. We also talk about an Epic Special Ability and look at more Regional Results.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 51
item.description: In Episode 51, we review two new figures from the Vengeance V-Set. We also discuss some recent league games and Regional results. Plus, we take a look at "Never Tell Me the Odds" and how it affects gameplay.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 51, we review two new figures from the Vengeance V-Set. We also discuss some recent league games and Regional results. Plus, we take a look at "Never Tell Me the Odds" and how it affects gameplay.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 51, we review two new figures from the Vengeance V-Set. We also discuss some recent league games and Regional results. Plus, we take a look at "Never Tell Me the Odds" and how it affects gameplay.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 50
item.description: In Episode 50, we look at the "game changers" that can be found in Vengeance. They also discuss some possible combinations that may prove to be very interesting. And, don't forget, Regionals have begun and we give you a run down of the results and upcoming dates.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 50, we look at the "game changers" that can be found in Vengeance. They also discuss some possible combinations that may prove to be very interesting. And, don't forget, Regionals have begun and we give you a run down of the results and upcom
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 50, we look at the "game changers" that can be found in Vengeance. They also discuss some possible combinations that may prove to be very interesting. And, don't forget, Regionals have begun and we give you a run down of the results and upcoming dates.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 49
item.description: In Episode 49, we talk more Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We take a look at the new Force Powers and Commander Effects that can be found in each new set. We also give you a run down of our February league games.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 49, we talk more Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We take a look at the new Force Powers and Commander Effects that can be found in each new set. We also give you a run down of our February league games.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 49, we talk more Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We take a look at the new Force Powers and Commander Effects that can be found in each new set. We also give you a run down of our February league games.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 48
item.description: In Episode 48, we talk about the new Special Abilities found in both Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We also give you a run down from our latest league battles. A Top Ten List and Guess the Mini results round out the show.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 48, we talk about the new Special Abilities found in both Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We also give you a run down from our latest league battles. A Top Ten List and Guess the Mini results round out the show.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 48, we talk about the new Special Abilities found in both Vengeance and Cantina Brawl. We also give you a run down from our latest league battles. A Top Ten List and Guess the Mini results round out the show.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 47
item.description: In Episode 47, we discuss the recent changes to the SWMGPA Floor Rules and how they will affect Regional Play. We also review more figures and bring you a V Set related Top Ten List.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 47, we discuss the recent changes to the SWMGPA Floor Rules and how they will affect Regional Play. We also review more figures and bring you a V Set related Top Ten List.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 47, we discuss the recent changes to the SWMGPA Floor Rules and how they will affect Regional Play. We also review more figures and bring you a V Set related Top Ten List.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 46
item.description: In Episode 46, discuss Force Renewal and League Play for the month of December. We also return with not one, but two Vs. segments. And we talk more about custom figures and the upcoming V Sets.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 46, discuss Force Renewal and League Play for the month of December. We also return with not one, but two Vs. segments. And we talk more about custom figures and the upcoming V Sets.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 46, discuss Force Renewal and League Play for the month of December. We also return with not one, but two Vs. segments. And we talk more about custom figures and the upcoming V Sets.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 45
item.description: In Episode 45, we celebrate Christmas with three wisemen: Jedimaster27 (Marcous), Jester007 (Ian), and Darth Malus (Kris). They discuss how they have been making custom molds and figures, and what we can expect from them in the future. We also have our figure reviews and we discuss the new maps that we have to look forward to.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 45, we celebrate Christmas with three wisemen: Jedimaster27 (Marcous), Jester007 (Ian), and Darth Malus (Kris). They discuss how they have been making custom molds and figures, and what we can expect from them in the future. We also have our
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 45, we celebrate Christmas with three wisemen: Jedimaster27 (Marcous), Jester007 (Ian), and Darth Malus (Kris). They discuss how they have been making custom molds and figures, and what we can expect from them in the future. We also have our figure reviews and we discuss the new maps that we have to look forward to.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 44
item.description: In Episode 44, we are joined by two different guests! First, Nickname (Jason Tanner) returns to discuss the Special Ability of Affinity. Darth Jim also joins the show to fill us in on how That Game Convention tournament ran in Pennsylvania. And, as always, we give you a few figure reviews and a league report of our own.

item.itunes:summary: In Episode 44, we are joined by two different guests! First, Nickname (Jason Tanner) returns to discuss the Special Ability of Affinity. Darth Jim also joins the show to fill us in on how That Game Convention tournament ran in Pennsylvania. And, as always, we give you a few figure reviews and a league report of our own.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 43
item.description: In Episode 43, Mark and Tim revisit Fantasy Flight Games and what they hope for with the new license. We also take a shot at explaining the Special Ability Sniper. We have figure reviews, our top ten list, and our league report as well.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 43, Mark and Tim revisit Fantasy Flight Games and what they hope for with the new license. We also take a shot at explaining the Special Ability Sniper. We have figure reviews, our top ten list, and our league report as well.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 43, Mark and Tim revisit Fantasy Flight Games and what they hope for with the new license. We also take a shot at explaining the Special Ability Sniper. We have figure reviews, our top ten list, and our league report as well.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 42
item.description: In Episode 42, Mark and Tim recap their league play from the month of September, complete with a Battle Royale! They also discuss Impulsive Overwhelming Force and a couple new figures from Renegades and Rogues. Tim interviews Nateal from a fairly new podcast: Geek Fatale.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 42, Mark and Tim recap their league play from the month of September, complete with a Battle Royale! They also discuss Impulsive Overwhelming Force and a couple new figures from Renegades and Rogues. Tim interviews Nateal from a fairly new po
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 42, Mark and Tim recap their league play from the month of September, complete with a Battle Royale! They also discuss Impulsive Overwhelming Force and a couple new figures from Renegades and Rogues. Tim interviews Nateal from a fairly new podcast: Geek Fatale.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 41
item.description: In Episode 41, we bring you figure reviews from Renegades and Rogues. The boys also return from their hiatus to bring you their views on a couple new pieces AND they bring a guest. We also bring you up to date on some errata and FAQ with the new set.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 41, we bring you figure reviews from Renegades and Rogues. The boys also return from their hiatus to bring you their views on a couple new pieces AND they bring a guest. We also bring you up to date on some errata and FAQ with the new set.
item.itunes:summary: In Episode 41, we bring you figure reviews from Renegades and Rogues. The boys also return from their hiatus to bring you their views on a couple new pieces AND they bring a guest. We also bring you up to date on some errata and FAQ with the new set.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 40
item.description: In EPICsode 40, we break down the Battle of Theed and Epic V Sets. We discuss the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers found in both sets. We also report on how our August league went and reveal our latest Guess the Mini.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In EPICsode 40, we break down the Battle of Theed and Epic V Sets. We discuss the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers found in both sets. We also report on how our August league went and reveal our latest Guess the Mini.
item.itunes:summary: In EPICsode 40, we break down the Battle of Theed and Epic V Sets. We discuss the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers found in both sets. We also report on how our August league went and reveal our latest Guess the Mini.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 39
item.description: In this slightly longer Episode 39, we discuss the recent news regarding Fantasy Flight Games and the Star Wars License. We also recap all of the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers than can be found in the new V-Set, Renegades and Rogues. Plus, we give you a rundown of our July league events and another Top Ten.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In this slightly longer Episode 39, we discuss the recent news regarding Fantasy Flight Games and the Star Wars License. We also recap all of the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers than can be found in the new V-Set, Renegades and

We also recap all of the new Special Abilities, Commander Effects, and Force Powers than can be found in the new V-Set, Renegades and Rogues. Plus, we give you a rundown of our July league events and another Top Ten.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 38
item.description: In Episode 38, as you gear up for GenCon, we run down the last few Regional results. We also have a discussion about "angry Ewoks" and 25,000 year old "hand". Tim interviews Kez (Kerry Logan) from New Zealand and TimmerB (Tim Ballard) calls in following his Wisconsin Regional win.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim

item.itunes:summary: In Episode 38, as you gear up for GenCon, we run down the last few Regional results. We also have a discussion about "angry Ewoks" and 25,000 year old "hand". Tim interviews Kez (Kerry Logan) from New Zealand and TimmerB (Tim Ballard) calls in following his Wisconsin Regional win.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 37
item.description: In Episode 37, we bring you more Regional results, including a detailed report from our own Wisconsin Regional. We also are joined by Nickname, as he explains the difference between Reserves and Reinforcements. And, the show the wouldn't be complete without our Top Ten and Guess the Mini contest.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim

We also are joined by Nickname, as he explains the difference between Reserves and Reinforcements. And, the show the wouldn't be complete without our Top Ten and Guess the Mini contest.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 36
item.description: In Episode 36, we run down more Regional Results and what squads are doing well. We also bring you part two of Tim's interview with three ladies that enjoy playing the game of minis. Along with league play and figure reviews, we manage to squeeze in a discussion about...well...squeezing.

Along with league play and figure reviews, we manage to squeeze in a discussion about...well...squeezing.

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 35
item.description: In Episode 35, Tim interviews THREE ladies that all play Star Wars Minis. We also reveal the results of our "Favorite Sculpt" poll and discuss the recent changes to funding for Renegades and Rogues. All this, plus figure reviews, regional reports, and a visit from our boys.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim

item.title: Star Wars Miniverse - Episode 34
item.description: In Episode 34, our boys bring you "The Good, the Bad, & the Ugly" of Dejarik figures. Tim and Mark also have a figure review and they discuss more about maps that are available for playing the game.
item.itunes:author: Mark & Tim
item.itunes:subtitle: In Episode 34, our boys bring you "The Good, the Bad, & the Ugly" of Dejarik figures. Tim and Mark also have a figure review and they discuss more about maps that are available for playing the game.
